languages.text: Соломон выявил сговор в составе старших офицеров флагмана и просит аудиенции с Вольным Торговцем.

traits.locale_text: Соломон выявил сговор в составе старших офицеров флагмана и просит аудиенции с Вольным Торговцем.

languages.text: Solomorne has uncovered a plot among the flagship's senior officers and is requesting an audience with the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Соломон выявил сговор в составе старших офицеров флагмана и просит аудиенции с Вольным Торговцем.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne has uncovered a plot among the flagship's senior officers and is requesting an audience with the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: Solomorne hat eine Verschwörung unter den leitenden Offizieren des Flaggschiffs aufgedeckt und bittet um eine Audienz {mf|beim Freihändler|bei der Freihändlerin}.
languages.original_text: Solomorne has uncovered a plot among the flagship's senior officers and is requesting an audience with the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne hat eine Verschwörung unter den leitenden Offizieren des Flaggschiffs aufgedeckt und bittet um eine Audienz {mf|beim Freihändler|bei der Freihändlerin}.

languages.text: Solomorne demande une audience avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, car il a découvert que les officiers supérieurs du vaisseau amiral manigançaient quelque chose.
languages.original_text: Solomorne has uncovered a plot among the flagship's senior officers and is requesting an audience with the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne demande une audience avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, car il a découvert que les officiers supérieurs du vaisseau amiral manigançaient quelque chose.

languages.text: 索罗蒙发现了旗舰上高阶军官的阴谋，要求与行商浪人见面。
languages.original_text: Solomorne has uncovered a plot among the flagship's senior officers and is requesting an audience with the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 索罗蒙发现了旗舰上高阶军官的阴谋，要求与行商浪人见面。

languages.text: Solomorne ha descubierto una conspiración entre los oficiales veteranos de la nave insignia y solicita una audiencia con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: Solomorne has uncovered a plot among the flagship's senior officers and is requesting an audience with the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne ha descubierto una conspiración entre los oficiales veteranos de la nave insignia y solicita una audiencia con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: ソロモーンは旗艦の上級士官たちの陰謀を暴き、ローグトレーダーとの面会を求めている。
languages.original_text: Solomorne has uncovered a plot among the flagship's senior officers and is requesting an audience with the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: ソロモーンは旗艦の上級士官たちの陰謀を暴き、ローグトレーダーとの面会を求めている。

languages.text: Solomorne, sancak gemisinin kıdemli subaylarının ördüğü hain komployu ortaya çıkarmış, Hür Tacir'in huzuruna çıkmayı talep ediyor.
languages.original_text: Solomorne has uncovered a plot among the flagship's senior officers and is requesting an audience with the Rogue Trader.
